01.name: Maggie Peterson
01.text: My first victim since I trapped myself in a doll body. I learned a lot from that experience, for example now I know that she can't fly

02.name: Eddie Caputo
02.text: At the beginning he was a good partner but his betrayal and explosive temper finished him off

03.name: John Death
03.text: I stabbed his heart with voodoo. I don't know why I never used this technique again

04.name: Dr. Ardmore
04.text: He was a little nervous and I decided to apply a calming treatment to him
